'''Stormstress''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Stretchy Anemo Fungus''' that appears in the [[Lil' Fungi's Fun-Tastic Fiesta]] event.

{{Enemy Stats
|hide_notes = 1

|atk_ratio = 4.32
|atk_type  = 2
}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Stretchy Anemo Fungus V3

|name_1      = Balmy Breeze
|desc_1      = Creates a Balmy Breeze area. The Lil' Fungus within the area with the lowest HP will be continually healed by '''6%''' of their Max HP every '''0.25''' seconds for a total of 3 seconds. When healing, it will also briefly apply {{Anemo}} to the Fungi healed.

|name_2      = Windy Turnaround
|desc_2      = Within 6 seconds after taking damage, the opponent will not prioritize Stormstress as the target. 6 seconds after receiving damage, Stormstress will continuously regenerate '''7.5%''' of Max HP for herself every '''1.5''' seconds.

|name_3      = Normal Attack
|desc_3      = Rapidly fires 3 times, each dealing '''150% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}}. 
}}
